! Life Solin - Royal Archive of Aden: Arrogant Emperor Baium openly opposed Einhasad, he desired to get rid of the intervention of the gods and to become a god. To gain eternal life and immortality, he began to build a huge tower in defiance of Einhasad. Immensely cruel was the fate of the emperor, who dared to resist the all-powerful goddess. Puffed up Baium was cursed Einhasad and other gods and imprisoned in a tower erected by himself. It turned into a world unknown creature that is neither a man nor an evil spirit or god. He found no eternal life and immortality, miserable now can not dispose of any of its life or his death. Later, people called this bath Tower of Insolence. It serves as a good example showing how unreasonable is caused by the resistance of human audacity great gods.
